title: Backend Software Engineers are Designers Too
description:
In technology, we typically associate ‘design’ with front-end developers and visual aesthetics – a beautiful website or a visually appealing user interface. But, backend developers are designers too. They are masters of System Design, meticulously crafting the architecture, dependencies, and data structures that influence user experiences. This post will explore the hidden artistry in their... Read more »

The post Backend Software Engineers are Designers Too appeared first on Developer Tech News.
